title: SAFIRE (Capstone)
description: Smart AI Feedback, Inquiry, and Reporting Environment (mobile app)
long: A mobile platform for secure student inquiries, anonymous incident reporting and AI-assisted issue classification. Built with React Native (Expo), Firebase, and Google Cloud Natural Language.

title: Feedback Management System
description: Admin and user web-based feedback management tool.
long: Feedback Management System with role-based access for admins and users, supporting reporting and analytics.

title: Mobile UI Prototypes
long: Collection of mobile UI prototypes and flows for student tools created in Figma.
